events.message: I recently purchased a product but would like to request a refund because it does not meet my expectations and I am unsatisfied with the quality.
The system has categorized this case as a refund request based on the customer's mention of money back and dissatisfaction.
This case has been assigned to agent Sarah Thompson from the Refunds Department to handle the customer's return request.

My order number is 123456. The product did not work as described, and the quality was much worse than expected, so I want to return it.
Thank you for the info. We can process your refund as soon as we receive the returned item. I will send you a prepaid shipping label shortly.
Thank you for the quick response and the prepaid label offer. I appreciate the help and will send the item back today.

Just following up to check if you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund was received and there are no further concerns, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
